title: The Dunwich Horror: Seven Stories
description: This edition reprints seven stories appearing in the 1963 Arkham House edition. The reprinted stories include:"In the Vault";"Pickman's Model";"The Rats in the Walls";"The Music of Erich Zann";"The Haunter of the Dark";"The Dunwich Horror";and "The Thing on the Doorstep".
author: H.P. Lovecraft
